title: Analysis of an exponential function part - b

content.question: Find the x-coordinate of each critical point of F. For each such x, determine whether f(x) is a relative maximum, a relative minimum, or neither.

frqParts.text: Find the x-coordinate of each critical point of F. For each such x, determine whether f(x) is a relative maximum, a relative minimum, or neither.

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
